attributes.action: Reduce the price of UK petrol
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why are we in the uk being charged so much for Petrol when our EU countries aren't. We sit back and let this go by on a regular basis as it rises on average a penny a week sometimes more.
In Spain fule is just over 1 euro which equates to 75p a litre, i went to Gibralta A uk governed country, fuel was 54p for unleaded. So why are we british beging over charged so much for the same product that our EU countries get and charge a lot less for.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps several in existence already -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Petrol-tax/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
